lead_paragraph: Canada drew first blood in the best-of-three World Cup of Hockey final on Tuesday with a 3-1 victory that brought Team Europe's Cinderella run a step closer to striking midnight.

headline.print_headline: Canada Beat Team Europe in World Cup Final Opener
headline.main: Canada Beat Team Europe in World Cup Final Opener

snippet: Canada drew first blood in the best-of-three World Cup of Hockey final on Tuesday with a 3-1 victory that brought Team Europe's Cinderella run a step closer to striking midnight....
